name: TownDefenceXCardGame
description:
Defend crystal from Evile Snowmans by building Town. How many rounds do you think you can keep the crystal alive?

How to play:

  • Use Space to skip waiting for next round 
  • W D to rotate Camera Drag the card to the desired fields

Card:

  • Tower - Build Tower that shoot arrowWall - Build wall to add 50 HP to your Crystal
  • Wall - Build wall to add 50 HP to your Crystal
  • Smith - Build blacksmith house that gennerate upgrade tower dmg to deck each round
  • Wizard - Build wizard tower that gennerate AOE Spell to deck each round
  • UpgradeTower/Smith - card that provide level up to Wizard and Smith buildings
